Posts.Content:
Hello - 
I am new to this site and forum. I am encouraged by the amount of discussion here! 
Just a few days ago I was told I have a complex cyst in my left breast. My physician and the Breast Center recommended a biopsy even though it appears to be "low suspicion". I then looked up the general cost of a biopsy and was floored - $1,000 to $5,000. Is this accurate? On the new health plan, our insurance has changed dramatically and everything this year, for the first $4,500 has to come out of our pockets before insurance kicks in. This would be a huge hardship for our family.
Would you ladies recommend getting the biopsy anyway? What have the costs been for you (if that's too personal of a question please tell me).
I am going to call the insurance company Monday to get more information and I have a call in to the Breast Center to see if they can give me a ball park figure on the cost.
Thoughts? I would appreciate any wisdom you have to offer.
Thank you,
Susan
Posts.Title: Complex Cyst - do biopsy or not?

Posts.Content: Thank you LdyJane and barkyboys for responding! I am going to make phone calls today and hopefully have some more information with which to make a final decision. I will let you know what I find out!
